title: Sichuan Beef Stir Fry
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons cooking oil', '15g dried red chillies', '300g beef sirloin steak, cut across the grain into 6cm x 0.3cm strands', '1 teaspoon rice wine', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 (1.5cm) piece fresh ginger, cut into thin matchsticks', '100g celery (preferably Chinese celery), leaves discarded, cut into thin matchsticks', '30g fresh red chillies, seeded and finely chopped', '50g spring onions, white parts only, cut into thin matchsticks', 'salt to taste', 'chicken stock granules to taste', '1 teaspoon sesame oil']
